snippet: Visiting Swansea capitalized on two defensive lapses by the Chelsea defender Branislav Ivanovic to win, 2-0, in the first leg of the League Cup semifinals.
abstract: Swansea defeats Chelsea, 2-0, in first leg of League Cup semifinals; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Visiting Swansea capitalized on two defensive lapses by the Chelsea defender Branislav Ivanovic to win, 2-0, in the first leg of the League Cup semifinals.

headline.main: Swansea Tops Chelsea in First Leg of League Cup
headline.print_headline: Swansea Tops Chelsea in First Leg of League Cup
